title: Twitter could be working on its own podcasting platform
content:
Twitter has been actively developing and releasing new features lately. Earlier today, we reported that the company is rolling out the ability to create Communities directly from the website or mobile app — instead of having to fill and submit an application form. Additionally, the service is testing 1080p video uploads with Twitter Blue subscribers

The post Twitter could be working on its own podcasting platform appeared first on xda-developers.
description: New traces reveal that Twitter could be working on its own podcasting platform. It's unclear when and if it'll see the light of day.
